readingMnemonic: You learned how to make this kind of <kanji>sugar</kanji> in <reading>とう</reading>きょう. You found a special とうきょう sugar sensei and they introduced you to all the secret methods you know now.
meaningMnemonic: Bring some <radical>rice</radical> under a <radical>canopy</radical> and stuff it in a <radical>wolverine</radical>'s <radical>mouth</radical>. Make it chew it a bit, scrape it out, and voila — you've made <kanji>sugar</kanji>!
